Categorize orthogroups by presence pattern

Source: R/plot-pan.R
categorize_orthogroups.Rd

Internal helper that assigns each orthogroup to a category based on how many assemblies contain it.

Usage

categorize_orthogroups(
  clusters,
  pa = NULL,
  rare_threshold = 0.1,
  accessory_threshold = 0.6
)

Arguments

clusters

An orthogroup_result object.

pa

Optional pre-built pa_matrix. If NULL, built internally.

rare_threshold

Proportion threshold for "Rare" category (default 0.10). Orthogroups present in <= this proportion of assemblies (but > 1) are "Rare".

accessory_threshold

Proportion threshold for "Accessory" category (default 0.60). Orthogroups present in <= this proportion (but > rare_threshold) are "Accessory".

Value

A tibble with columns: orthogroup_id, n_present, n_assemblies, category
